Body: When there is a rubber-protector around the phone or the tablet, I find it extremely difficult to do a palm-swipe-to-capture action,  to get a screenshot. That's due to the fact that the raised edges of the screen protector prevents my palm to completely flush on the surface of the phone. Is there a way to get the screenshot any other way and a more convenient way? Or an app that will do that? matye thru share via route??
Title: alternative ways to take screenshots on Galaxy

history.Text: When there is a rubber-protector around the phone or the tablet, I find it extremely difficult to do a palm-swipe-to-capture action,  to get a screenshot. That's due to the fact that the raised edges of the screen protector prevents my palm to completely flush on the surface of the phone. Is there a way to get the screenshot any other way and a more convenient way? Or an app that will do that? matye thru share via route??
alternative ways to take screenshots on Galaxy
